content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Smelting Area (x=0-6, y=0-4)
Consists of multiple furnaces for smelting iron:
- Stone furnace at position(0,0)
- Stone furnace at position(2,0)
- Stone furnace at position(4,4)
- Stone furnace at position(6,4)

###Inserter Production Line (x=20-27, y=2.5)
Assembly line for creating inserters:
- Input chest at position(20.5,2.5) containing 175 inserters
- Burner inserter at position(21.5,2.5) with 4 coal as fuel
- Assembling machine 1 at position(23.5,2.5)
- Burner inserter at position(25.5,2.5) with 19 coal as fuel
- Output chest at position(26.5,2.5)

###Power Generation System (x=-9.5 to 6.5, y=21.5-27)
Complete power generation setup:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5,24.5) producing water
- Pipe network connecting water from pump to boiler
- Boiler at position(-2.5,24) converting water to steam
- Steam pipe network connecting boiler to engine
- Steam engine at position(4.5,24.5) generating electricity
- Small electric poles at positions(2.5,24.5) and (6.5,24.5) distributing power

###Research Lab Network
Multiple labs connected to electricity network (id=70956):
- Several labs with automation science packs (12-74 packs)
- Some labs with logistic science packs (14-40 packs)
- Multiple unpowered labs

ERROR TIPS

### Issues with inventory management
- Always check if required items are in inventory before attempting to insert them into machines
- Keep track of fuel (coal) levels for burner inserters and boilers

### Assembly line resource shortages
- Ensure all required components (iron plate, iron gear wheel, electronic circuit) are available before starting assembly
- Monitor input chest inventory to maintain continuous production

### Power system errors
- Cannot use list type directly in get_entities call for electricity group
- Use correct API calls for checking power network status

### Recipe crafting errors
- Cannot craft items that require furnace/assembly machine directly from inventory
- Ensure proper production chain is set up for intermediate products

### Entity placement
- Check entity positions and connections before placing new structures
- Verify fluid connections in pipe networks are properly aligned
